solution_line_template: Jimmy has {jimmy_total_matches} matches because {jimmy_matchbooks} times {matches_per_matchbook} equals <<{jimmy_matchbooks}*{matches_per_matchbook}={jimmy_total_matches}>>{jimmy_total_matches}.

Jimmy trades this for {stamps_jimmy_gets} stamps because {jimmy_total_matches} divided by {matches_per_stamp} equals <<{jimmy_total_matches}/{matches_per_stamp}={stamps_jimmy_gets}>>{stamps_jimmy_gets}
Tonya has {tonya_stamps_left} stamps left because {tonya_initial_stamps} minus {stamps_jimmy_gets} equals <<{tonya_initial_stamps}-{stamps_jimmy_gets}={tonya_stamps_left}>>{tonya_stamps_left}.
